price: ߔߔߎߚߎ߫ ߸ ߏ ߕߎ߬ߡߊ ߟߋ߫ ߣߌ߲߬؟ ߌ ߓߘߊ߫ ߞߎ߬ߕߊ ߞߍ߫ ߞߘߐ߬ߡߊ߲߫ ߞߊ߬ ߞߍ߫ ߕߌߢߍߟߌߟߊ ߟߎ߬ ߘߏ߫ ߘߌ߫
arabic: ءَآلۡـَٰٔنَ وَقَدۡ عَصَيۡتَ قَبۡلُ وَكُنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: āl'āna waqad ʿaṣayta qablu wakunta mina al-muf'sidīna
